meanings.definition: A game of chance played with cards having numbered squares.
meanings.sent1: During the family game night, we played bingoes and had so much fun!
meanings.sent2: The children gathered around the table to play bingoes with excitement.
meanings.sent3: In the bingoes game, my grandma kept winning all the rounds!
meanings.sent4: The bingoes cards were like magical tickets to a world of numbers and luck.
meanings.sent5: The sound of 'bingo!' echoed through the room as someone won at bingoes.

meanings.definition: A call made by a player who has a complete row of numbers on their card.
meanings.sent1: When she shouted 'bingoes!', everyone knew she had won the game.
meanings.sent2: The player's loud 'bingoes' filled the room, declaring their victory.
meanings.sent3: His 'bingoes' call was so loud that it startled the other players.
meanings.sent4: The 'bingoes' call was like music to the ears of the winning player.
meanings.sent5: The final 'bingoes' call marked the end of an exciting round of the game.
